name: regex-text-gen
description: Generate text based on Regular Expression (regex)

commands.title: Generate text based on Regular Expression (regex)

regexTextGen.generatorRegex.description: Start of the input box: Generator Regex. default: (a|b|c){5,}

regexTextGen.defaultUpperLimit.description: Upperlimit for repetition qualifiers: *, + and {n,}. default: 10

regexTextGen.baseCharSet.description: Character set "." will generate from. Array of: single unicode char ("\u0009") or unicode character range ("a-\u007a"). Default: HTab + Basic Latin

regexTextGen.whitespaceCharSet.description: Character set "\s" will generate from. Array of: single unicode char ("\u0009") or unicode character range ("a-\u007a"). Default: HTab + SPACE

regexTextGen.digitCharSet.description: Character set "\d" will generate from. Array of: single unicode char ("\u0009") or unicode character range ("a-\u007a"). Default: 0-9

regexTextGen.wordCharSet.description: Character set "\w" will generate from. Array of: single unicode char ("\u0009") or unicode character range ("a-\u007a"). Default: 0-9 + a-z + A-Z + UNDERSCORE

regexTextGen.originalTextRegex.description: Start of the input box: Match Original Text Regex (full Javascript syntax). default: .*
